title: (Bug) Error when WiFi disconnects temporarily
body:
Here's what I did:
1. Run application
2. Turn off Wi-Fi
3. Friend sends me message
4. I send friend message
5. Turn on Wi-Fi

Obviously, no messages were received while the Wi-Fi was turned off. **After the Wi-Fi was turned back on, messages were still not received.**
I had to restart the application to send/receive messages.
